attributes.action: Make prisons a deterrent to those thinking of commiting a crime or re-offending.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Put more than one prisoner to a cell, 3 minimum this would alleviate current vacancy situation.
Switch off hot water and heating, take away pool tables, newspapers, gyms, and cigarettes.
Swop the food budget with schools so they have less to spend and schools have more.
Give them one itchy wool blanket and put a bucket in the corner of cell so they have to slop out.
Give them hard labour then they might not want to go back....

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
